meanings.sent1: She wore her peachiest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with the peachiest flowers.
meanings.sent3: The peachiest cake at the bake sale disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the peachiest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The peachiest sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: (adverb) in a very pleasing or attractive manner
meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed peachiest in the spring.
meanings.sent2: She sang peachiest at the talent show.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out lazily, looking peachiest in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The music played softly, filling the room peachiest.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies wafted through the house peachiest.
